base_description: Round, white jar with a flat lid.
part_description: The jar has a cylindrical lid on top and a bulbous body below. The lid is flat and circular, while the body is round with vertical grooves.
internal_interaction_description: The lid securely fits onto the jar's opening, creating a seal. The grooves on the body may provide grip, aiding in opening and closing the lid. The internal space is hollow, designed for storage.
external_interaction_description: The jar can be placed on flat surfaces due to its stable base. It can hold various contents, accessed by removing the lid. The grooves assist in manual handling, making it easy to grip and carry.
